timeline.message: fix for stored procedure retry throttle

timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText: oops, sorry, will change right now
replies.author: xinlian12

timeline.bodyText: Can we put this test in "emulator" group ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: changed to emulator group. can I know what is the concern here?
replies.author: xinlian12

replies.bodyText:
Of course, since this test is not a very big test and uses mocking, so it won't take much resources.
Running it in "emulator" group makes sure it runs in the small CI that automatically triggers when we create the PR.
Whereas if you run the test in "long" group, then you will have to trigger full live CI to run this test case - which doesn't make sense for these quick test cases.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: got it, thanks for the explanation~
replies.author: xinlian12
